anya-e0701n0:14_0: Vinayapiṭakaṃ, abhidhammapiṭakaṃ suttantapiṭakanti. Tattha katamaṃ vinaya piṭakaṃ?
anya-e0701n0:15_2: Imāni satta pakaraṇāni abhidhammapiṭakaṃ nāma. Katamaṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ? Sīlakkhandhavaggādikaṃ,
anya-e0701n0:16: Kathaṃ nikāyato? Nikāyā pañca vidhā honti. Dīghanikāyo, majjhimanikāyo, saṃyuttanikāyo, aṅguttaranikāyo, khuddakanikāyoti.
anya-e0701n0:17_0: Tattha katamo dīgha-nikāyo? Sīlakkhandhavaggo, mahāvaggo, pāthikavaggoti, ime tayo
anya-e0701n0:17_1: vaggā dīghanikāyo nāma. Imesu tīsu vaggesu, catutiṃsa vaggāni ca honti. [Catutiṃseva
anya-e0701n0:17_2: suttantā, sīlakkhandhavaggādikā, yassa bhavanti so yeva dīghanikāya nāma hoti.]
anya-e0701n0:18_0: Katamo majjhimanikāyo? Mūlapaṇṇāso, majjhimapaṇṇāso, uparipaṇṇāsoti, ime tayo paṇṇāsā
anya-e0701n0:18_1: majjhimanikāyo nāma. Imesu tīsu paṇṇāsesu dvepaññāsādhika-sutta-satāni honti [diyaḍḍhasatasuttantā,
anya-e0701n0:18_2: dvi suttaṃ yassa santiso, majjhimanikāyo nāmo mūlapaṇṇāsamādi hoti.]
anya-e0701n0:19_0: Katamo saṃyuttanikāyo? Sagāthāvaggo, nidānavaggo, khandhakavaggo, saḷāyatanavaggo,
anya-e0701n0:19_1: mahāvaggoti, ime pañca vaggā saṃyuttanikāyo nāma. Imesu pañcasu vaggesu dvāsaṭṭhisuttasattasatādhikasatta-suttasahassāni
anya-e0701n0:19_2: honti. [Dvāsaṭṭhi-satta-satāni, sattasahassakāni ca.] Suttāni yassa honti so, sagāthādikavaggako,
anya-e0701n0:20_0: Katamo aṅguttaranikāyo? Ekkanipāto, dukkanipāto, tikkanipāto, catukkanipāto, pañcakanipāto,
anya-e0701n0:20_1: chakkanipāto, sattakanipāto, aṭṭhakanipāto, navakanipāto, dasakanipāto, ekādasanipātoti,
anya-e0701n0:20_2: ime ekādasa nipātā aṅguttaranikāyo nāma. Imesu ekādasa nipātesu satta-paññāsa-pañca-satādhikanava-sutta-sahassāni
anya-e0701n0:20_3: honti. [Navasuttasahassāni, pañcasatamattāni ca, sattapaññāsādhikāni, suttāni yassa
anya-e0701n0:21_0: Katamo khuddakanikāyo? Khuddakapāṭho, dhammapadaṃ, udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, suttanipāto,
anya-e0701n0:21_1: vimānavatthu, petavatthu, therakathā, therīkathā, jātakaṃ, mahāniddeso, paṭisambhidāmaggo,
anya-e0701n0:21_2: apadānaṃ, buddhavaṃso, cariyāpiṭakaṃ, vinayapiṭakaṃ, abhidhammapiṭakanti. Imesu sattarasasu
anya-e0701n0:21_3: ganthesu anekāni sutta-sahassāni honti. [Anekāni sutta-sahassāni, niddiṭṭhāni mahesinā,
anya-e0701n0:21_4: nikāye pañcame ime, khuddake iti visuteti.]
anya-e0701n0:22_0: Kathaṃ aṅgato aṅgahi nava vidhaṃ hoti? Suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthā, udānaṃ,
anya-e0701n0:22_1: itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallanti, navappabhedaṃ hoti. Tattha ubhato
anya-e0701n0:22_3: Aññampi suttanāmakaṃ tathāgatavacanaṃ, suttanti veditabbaṃ. Sabbaṃ sagāthakaṃ geyyanti
anya-e0701n0:22_4: veditabbaṃ. Visesanasaṃyuttake sakalopi sagāthakavaggo, sakalaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ
anya-e0701n0:22_5: nigāthakañca suttayañca aññampi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi asaṅgahitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ taṃ veyyākaraṇanti
anya-e0701n0:22_6: veditabbaṃ. Dhammapadaṃ, therakathā, therīkathā, suttanipāte, no suttanāmikā suddhikagāthā,
anya-e0701n0:22_7: gāthāti veditabbā. Somanassa ñāṇamayikagāthā paṭika-saṃyuttā dve asītisuttantā udānanti
anya-e0701n0:22_9: veditabbā. Apaṇṇakajātakādīni paññāsādikāni. Pañcajātakasatāni, jātakanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0701n0:22_10: Cattāro me bhikkhave acchariyā abhūtadhammā, ānandetiādinayappavattā sabbepi acchariya
anya-e0701n0:22_11: abhūtadhammapaṭisaṃyuttā suttantā abhūtadhammanti veditabbā. Cullavedalla, mahāvedalla,
anya-e0701n0:22_12: sammādiṭṭhi, sakkapañha, saṅkhārabhājaniya, mahāpuṇṇamasuttantādayo sabbepi vedañca
anya-e0701n0:22_13: tuṭṭhiñca laddhā [puccha] laddhā pucchitasuttantā, vedallanti veditabbā. Katamāni
anya-e0701n0:22_14: caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassāni dujānāni, caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassāni sace
anya-e0701n0:22_15: vitthārena kathissaṃ atipapañco bhavissati. Tasmā naya vasena kathissāmi. Ekaṃ vatthu,
anya-e0701n0:22_16: eko dhammakkhandho, ekaṃ nidānaṃ eko dhammakkhandho, ekaṃ pañhā pucchantaṃ eko dhammakkhandho,
anya-e0701n0:22_17: ekaṃ pañhā visajjanaṃ eko dhammakkhandho, caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassāni kena
anya-e0701n0:22_18: bhāsitāni, kattha bhāsitāni, kadā bhāsitāni, kamārabbha bhāsitāni, kimatthaṃ bhāsitāni,
anya-e0701n0:22_19: kena dhāritāni, kenābhatāni, kimatthaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbāni. Tatrāyaṃ visajjanā, kena
anya-e0701n0:22_20: bhāsitānīti? Buddhānu buddhehi bhāsitāni. Kattha bhāsitānīti? Devesu ca mānussesu
anya-e0701n0:22_21: ca, bhāsitāni. Kadā bhāsitānīti? Bhagavato dharamānakāle ceva pacchimakāle ca bhāsitāni.
anya-e0701n0:22_22: Katamārabbha bhāsitānīti? Pañcavaggiyādike veneyya bandhave ārabbha bhāsitānīti.
anya-e0701n0:22_23: Kimatthaṃ bhāsitānīti? Tivajjañca avajjañca ñatvā vajjaṃ pahāya avajje paṭipattitvā
anya-e0701n0:23_0: Kena dhāritānīti? Anubuddhehi ceva sissānusissehi ca dhāritāni. Kenā bhatānīti? Ācariya
anya-e0701n0:23_1: paraṃparehi ābhatāni. Kimatthaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbānīti? Vajjañca avajjañca ñatvā vajjaṃ
anya-e0701n0:23_2: pahāya avajje paṭipattitvā nibbānapariyante diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthe, saṃpāpuṇituṃ,
anya-e0701n0:23_3: yadevaṃ tāya nibbānapariyante diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthe sādhikāni honti. Teva
anya-e0701n0:23_4: tattha kehi appamattena pariyāpuṇitabbāni dhāretabbāni dhāretabbāni vācetabbāni sajjhāyaṃ
anya-e0701n0:23_5: kātabbānīti [iti cullaganthavaṃse piṭakattaya dīpako nāma paṭhamo paricchedo.]
anya-e0701n0:25_0: Ācariyo pana atthi. Porāṇācariyā atthi, aṭṭhakathācariyā atthi, ganthakārakācariyā
anya-e0701n0:25_1: atthi, tividhanāmikācariyā. Katame porāṇācariyā? Paṭhamasaṅgāyanāyaṃ pañcasatā khīṇāsavā
anya-e0701n0:25_2: pañcannaṃ nikāyānaṃ nāmañca atthañca adhippāyañca yadañca byañjana sodhanañca avasesaṃ
anya-e0701n0:25_3: kiccaṃ kariṃsu. Dutiyasaṅgāyanāyaṃ sattasatā khīṇāsavā tesaṃyeva saddatthādikaṃ kiccaṃ
anya-e0701n0:25_4: puna kariṃsu. Tatiyasaṅgāyanāyaṃ sahassamattā khīṇāsavā tesaṃyeva saddatthādikaṃ
anya-e0701n0:25_5: kiccaṃ puna kariṃsu. Iccevaṃ dvesatādhikā dvesahassa khīṇāsavā mahākaccāyanaṃ ṭhapetvā
anya-e0701n0:25_6: avasesā porāṇācariyā nāma. Ye porāṇācariyā teyeva aṭṭhakathācariyā nāma. Katame ganthakārakācariyā?
anya-e0701n0:25_7: Mahāaṭṭhakathikāpebhadaanekācariyā ganthakārakācariyā nāma. Katame tividha nāmācariyā
anya-e0701n0:25_8: mahākaccāyano tividhanāmaṃ. Katame ganthā mahākaccāyanena katā? Kaccāyanagantho,
anya-e0701n0:25_10: ime cha ganthā mahākaccāyanena katā. Katame anekācariyena katā ganthā? Mahāpaccarikācariyo
anya-e0701n0:25_11: mahāpaccariyaṃ nāma ganthaṃ akāsi. Mahākurundikācariyo kurundi nāma ganthaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:25_12: Aññataro ācariyo mahāpaccariya ganthassa aṭṭhakathaṃ akāsi. Aññataro ācariyo kurundi
anya-e0701n0:25_13: ganthassa aṭṭhakathaṃ akāsi, mahābuddhaghosā nāmacariyo visuddhimaggo dīghanikāyassa
anya-e0701n0:25_14: sumaṅgalavilāsani nāma aṭṭhakathā, majjhimanikāyassa papañcasūdanī nāma aṭṭhakathā,
anya-e0701n0:25_15: saṃyuttanikāyassa sāratthappakāsinī nāma aṭṭhakathā, aṅguttaranikāyassa manorathapūraṇī
anya-e0701n0:25_16: nāma aṭṭhakathā, pañcavinaya ganthānaṃ samantapāsādikā nāma aṭṭhakathā, sattannaṃ
anya-e0701n0:25_17: abhidhammaganthānaṃ paramatthakathā nāma aṭṭhakathā, pātimokkha saṃkhātāya mātikāya
anya-e0701n0:25_18: kaṅkhāvitaraṇīti visuddhi nāma aṭṭhakathā, dhammapadassa aṭṭhakathā, jātakassa aṭṭhakathā,
anya-e0701n0:25_19: khuddakapāṭhassa aṭṭhakathā, suttanipātassa aṭṭhakathā, apadānassa aṭṭhakathāti,
anya-e0701n0:25_20: ime terasa ganthe akāsi. Buddhadattonāmācariyo vinaya vinicchayo, uttaravinicchayo,
anya-e0701n0:25_21: abhidhammāvatāro, buddhavaṃsassa madhuratthavilāsinī nāma aṭṭhakathāti, ime cattāro
anya-e0701n0:25_22: ganthe akāsi. Ānandonāmācariyā sattābhidhammaganthaṭṭhakathāya mūṭīkaṃ nāma ṭīkaṃ
anya-e0701n0:25_25: vimalavilāsini nāma aṭṭhakathā, petavatthussa vimalavilāsini nāma aṭṭhakathā, visuddhimaggassa
anya-e0701n0:25_26: paramatthamañjūsā nāma ṭīkā, dīghanikāyassa aṭṭhakathādīnaṃ catunnaṃ aṭṭhakathānaṃ
anya-e0701n0:25_27: līnatthappakāsani nāma ṭīkā, jātakaṭṭhakathāya līnatthappakāsani nāma ṭīkā, nettipakaraṇaṭṭhakathāya
anya-e0701n0:25_28: ṭīkā, buddhavaṃsaṭṭhakathāya paramatthadīpanī nāma ṭīkā, abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṭīkā
anya-e0701n0:25_29: līnatthavaṇṇanā nāma anuṭīkāti ime cuddasa matte ganthe akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:26_0: Dve pubbācariyānāmā cariyānirutti mañjūsaṃ nāma cullanirutti ṭīkañca mahānirutti
anya-e0701n0:26_1: saṅkhepañca akaṃsu. Mahāvajirabuddhināmācariyo vinayagaṇṭhināma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:26_2: Dīpaṅkarasaṅkhāto vimalabuddhi nāmācariyo mukhamattadīpanī nāmakaṃ nyāsappakaraṇaṃ
anya-e0701n0:26_3: akāsi. Cullavajirabuddhi nāmācariyo atthabyākhyānaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:27_0: Dīpaṅkaro nāmācariyo rūpasiddhi pakaraṇaṃ, rūpasiddhi ṭīkaṃ, sampapañca suttañceti
anya-e0701n0:27_1: tividhaṃ pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Ānandācariyassa jeṭṭhasisso dhammapālo nāmācariyo saccasaṅkhepaṃ
anya-e0701n0:27_2: nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Kassapo nāmācariyo mohavicchedanī, vimaticchedanī, dasabuddhavaṃso,
anya-e0701n0:28_0: Mahānāmo nāmācariyo, saddhammapakāsanī nāma paṭisambhidāmaggassa aṭṭhakathaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:28_1: Dīpavaṃso, thūpavaṃso, bodhivaṃso, cūlavaṃso, mahāvaṃso, paṭisambhidāmaggaṭṭhakathā
anya-e0701n0:28_2: gaṇṭhi ceti ime cha ganthā mahānāmācari visuṃ visuṃ katā.
anya-e0701n0:29_0: Navo mahānāmo nāmācariyo navaṃ mahāvaṃsa nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Upaseno nāmācariyo
anya-e0701n0:29_1: saddhammapajjotikaṃ nāma mahāniddesassa aṭṭhakathaṃ akāsi. Moggalāno nāmācariyo moggalānabyākaraṇaṃ
anya-e0701n0:29_2: nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Saṅgharakkhito nāmācariyo, subodhālaṅkāraṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:29_3: Vuttodayakāro nāmācariyo vuttodayaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Dhammasiri nāmācariyo khuddakasikkhaṃ
anya-e0701n0:29_4: nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Purāṇakhuddasikkhāya ṭīkā, mūlasikkhā ceti, ime dve ganthā
anya-e0701n0:30_1: ceti tividhaṃ pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Khemo nāmācariyo khemaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Sāriputto
anya-e0701n0:30_2: nāmācariyo vinayaṭṭhakathāya sāratthadīpanī nāma ṭīkaṃ; vinayasaṅgahapakaraṇaṃ, vinayasaṅgahassaṭīkaṃ;
anya-e0701n0:30_3: aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāya sāratthamañjūsaṃ nāma navaṃ ṭīkaṃ; pañcikā ṭīkañceti, ime pañca
anya-e0701n0:30_4: ganthe akāsi. Buddhanāgo nāmācariyo vinayatthamañjūsaṃ nāma kaṅkhāvitaraṇīyā ṭīkaṃ
anya-e0701n0:30_5: akāsi. Navo moggalāno nāmācariyo abhidhānappadīpikaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Vācissaro
anya-e0701n0:30_6: nāmācariyo mahāsāmi nāma subodhālaṅkārassa ṭīkā, vuttodaya vivaraṇaṃ, sumaṅgalappasādani
anya-e0701n0:30_7: nāma khuddasikkhāya ṭīkā; sambandhacintā, sambandhacintāya ṭīkā; bālāvatāro, moggalānabyākaraṇassa
anya-e0701n0:30_8: pañcikāya ṭīkā; yogavinicchayo, vinayavinicchayassa ṭīkā, uttaravinicchayassa ṭīkā,
anya-e0701n0:30_9: nāmarūpa-paricchedassa vibhāgo, saddatthassa padarūpavibhāvanaṃ; khemassa pakaraṇassa
anya-e0701n0:30_10: ṭīkā, sīmālaṅkāro, mūlasikkhāya ṭīkā, rūpavibhāgo, paccayasaṅgaho, saccasaṅkhepassa
anya-e0701n0:30_11: ṭīkā ceti, ime aṭṭhārasa ganthe akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:31_1: pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Buddhapiyo nāmācariyo sāratthasaṅgahaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Dhammakitti
anya-e0701n0:31_2: nāmācariyo dantadhātu pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Medhaṅkaro nāmācariyo jinacaritaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ
anya-e0701n0:31_3: akāsi. Buddharakkhito nāmācariyo jinalaṅkāraṃ, jinalaṅkārassa ṭīkañcāti duvidhaṃ
anya-e0701n0:31_4: pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Upatisso nāmācariyo anāgatavaṃsassa aṭṭhakathaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:32_0: Kaṅkhāvitaraṇīyā līnatthappakāsini, nisandeho, dhammānusāraṇī, ñeyyāsantati, ñeyyāsantatiyā
anya-e0701n0:32_1: ṭīkā, sumatādāvatāro, lokapaññatti pakaraṇaṃ, tathāgatuppatti pakaraṇaṃ, nalāṭadhātu
anya-e0701n0:32_2: vaṇṇanā, sīhaḷavatthu, dhammadīpako, paṭipattisaṅgaho, visuddhimaggaṇṭhi, abhidhammagaṇṭhi,
anya-e0701n0:32_4: subodhālaṅkārassa nava ṭīkā ceti, ime vīsati ganthā vīsatācariyehi visuṃ visuṃ katā.
anya-e0701n0:33_0: Saddhammasiri nāmācariyo saddatthabhedacintā nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Devo nāmācariyo
anya-e0701n0:33_1: sumana kūṭavaṇṇanaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Cullabuddhaghoso nāmācariyo sotatthakinidānaṃ
anya-e0701n0:33_2: nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Raṭṭhapālo nāmācariyo madhurasaṅgāhaṇīkitti nāma pakaraṇaṃ
anya-e0701n0:33_3: akāsi. Subhūtacando nāmācariyo liṅgatthavivaraṇa-pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Aggavaṃso nāmācariyo
anya-e0701n0:33_4: saddanīti pakaraṇaṃ nāma akāsi. Vajirabuddhi nāmācariyo mahāṭīkaṃ nāma nyāsapakaraṇaṭīkaṃ
anya-e0701n0:33_5: akāsi. Guṇasāgaro nāmācariyo mukhamattasāraṃ, mukhamattasārassa ṭīkañca duvidhaṃ
anya-e0701n0:33_6: pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Abhayo nāmācariyo saddatthabhedacintāya mahāṭīkaṃ akāsi. Ñāṇasāgaro
anya-e0701n0:33_7: nāmācariyo liṅgatthavivaraṇappakāsanaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Aññataro ācariyo gūḷatthaṭīkaṃ,
anya-e0701n0:33_8: bālappabodhanañca duvidhaṃ pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Aññataro ācariyo saddattha-bhedacintāya
anya-e0701n0:33_9: majjhimaṭīkaṃ akāsi. Uttamo nāmācariyo bālāvatāraṭīkaṃ, liṅgatthavivaraṇaṭīkañca
anya-e0701n0:33_10: duvidhaṃ pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Aññataro ācariyo saddatthabhedacintāya nava-ṭīkaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:33_11: Eko amacco abhidhānappadīpikāyaṭīkaṃ, gaṇṭhipakaraṇassa daṇḍīppakaraṇassa māgadhabhūtaṃ
anya-e0701n0:33_12: ṭīkaṃ, koladdhajanassa sakaṭabhāsāya kataṭīkañca tividhaṃ pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Dhammasenāpati
anya-e0701n0:33_13: nāmācariyo kārikaṃ, etimāsapidīpanī, manohārañca tividhaṃ pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Aññataro
anya-e0701n0:33_14: ācariyo kārikāya ṭīkaṃ akāsi. Aññataro ācariyo etimāsapidīpikāya ṭīkaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:34_0: Aññataro ācariyo saddabindu nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Saddhammaguru nāmācariyo saddavuttippakāsakaṃ
anya-e0701n0:34_1: nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Sāriputto nāmācariyo saddavuttippakāsakassa ṭīkaṃ akāsi. Aññataro
anya-e0701n0:34_2: ācariyo kaccāyanasāraṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ kaccāyanasārassa ṭīkañca duvidhaṃ pakaraṇaṃ
anya-e0701n0:34_3: akāsi. Navo medhaṅkaro nāmācariyo lokadīpakasāraṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Aggapaṇḍito
anya-e0701n0:34_4: nāmācariyo lokuppatti nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Cīvaro nāmācariyo jaṅghadāsakassa ṭīkaṃ
anya-e0701n0:34_6: ṭīkā, gaṇṭhi sāro, paṭṭhānagaṇanā nayo, suttaniddeso, pātimokkho, ceti, ime aṭṭha
anya-e0701n0:34_7: ganthe saddhammajotipālācariyo akāsi. Vimalabuddhi nāmācariyo abhidhamma-pannarasaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0701n0:34_8: nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi. Navo vimalabuddhi nāmācariyo saddasāratthajālinī, saddasāratthajāliniyā
anya-e0701n0:34_9: ṭīkā, vuttodaya ṭīkā, paramatthamañjūsā nāma abhidhammasaṅgahaṭīkāya anuṭīkā dasagaṇṭhivaṇṇanā,
anya-e0701n0:34_10: māgadhabhūtāvidaggamukhamaṇḍanaṭīkā ceti ime cha ganthe akāsi. Aññataro ācariyo pañcapakaraṇaṭīkāya
anya-e0701n0:34_11: navānuṭīkaṃ akāsi. Ariyavaṃso nāmācariyo abhidhammasaṅgaha-ṭīkāya [paramattha] maṇisāramañjūsaṃ
anya-e0701n0:34_12: nāma navānuṭīkaṃ akāsi. Abhidhammatthasaṅgahassa ṭīkā, peṭakopadesassa ṭīkā, catubhāṇavārassa
anya-e0701n0:34_13: aṭṭhakathā, mahāsārapakāsanī, mahādīpanī, sāratthadīpanī gati pakaraṇaṃ, hatthasāro,
anya-e0701n0:34_14: bhummasaṅgaho, bhummaniddeso, dasavatthukāyaviratiṭīkā, jotanā nirutti, vibhattikathā,
anya-e0701n0:34_15: kaccāyanavivaraṇā, saddhammamālinī, pañcagati vaṇṇanā, bālacittapabodhanaṃ, dhammacakkasuttassa
anya-e0701n0:34_16: navaṭṭhakathā, dantadhātu pakaraṇassa ṭīkā ceti, ime vīsati ganthā nānācariyehi katā,
anya-e0701n0:35_0: Katamāni saddhammo pāyano, bālappabodhanapakaraṇassa ṭīkā ca, jinālaṅkārapakaraṇassa
anya-e0701n0:35_1: navaṭīkā ca, liṅgatthavivaraṇaṃ, liṅgavinicchayo; pātimokkhavivaraṇaṃ, paramatthakathāvivaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0701n0:35_4: abhidhammatthasaṅgahassa ṭīkā vivaraṇaṃ, mahāvessantarājātakassa vivaraṇaṃ, sakkābhimataṃ,
anya-e0701n0:35_5: mahāvessantarajātakassa navaṭṭhakathā, paṭhama saṃbodhi, lokanetti ca, buddhaghosācariyanidānaṃ
anya-e0701n0:35_6: milindapañhā vaṇṇanā, caturā rakkhā, caturakkhāya aṭṭhakathā, saddavuttipakaraṇassa
anya-e0701n0:35_7: navaṭīkā, iccevaṃ pañcavīsati pamāṇāni pakaraṇāni laṅko dīpādīsuṭṭhānesu paṇḍitehi
anya-e0701n0:35_8: katāni ahesuṃ, sambuddhegāthā ca, naradeva nāma gāthā ca, dātave cīratti gāthā ca,
anya-e0701n0:35_9: vīsati ovādagāthā ca, dānasattari, sīlasattari, sappādānavaṇṇanā, anantabuddhavandanagāthā
anya-e0701n0:35_10: ca, aṭṭhavīsati buddhavandanagāthā ca, atītānāgatapaccuppannavandanagāthā ca, asītimahāsāvakavandanagāthā
anya-e0701n0:35_11: ca, navahāraguṇavaṇṇanā cāti, ime buddhapaṇāma-gāthādikā gāthā yo paṇḍitehi laṅkādīpādisuṭṭhānesu
anya-e0701n0:35_12: katā ahesuṃ [iti cullaganthavaṃse ganthakārakācariya dīpako nāma dutiyo paricchedo]
anya-e0701n0:37_0: Ācariyesu ca atthi jambudīpikācariyā atthi, laṅkādīpikācariyā. Katame jambudīpikācariyā?
anya-e0701n0:37_1: Katame laṅkādīpikācariyā? Mahākaccāyano jambudīpikācariyo so hi avantiraṭṭhe ujjenī
anya-e0701n0:37_2: nagare candapajjotassa nāma rañño purohito hutvā kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ disvā, gharāvāsaṃ
anya-e0701n0:37_3: pahāya satthusāsane pabbajjitvā heṭṭhā vuttappakāre ganthe akāsi. Mahāaṭṭhakathācariyo
anya-e0701n0:37_4: jambudīpiko, mahāpaccarikācariyo, mahākurundikācariyo, aññataro ācariyā dveti ime
anya-e0701n0:37_5: ca bhūvācariyā. Laṅkādīpikācariyā nāma te kira buddhaghosācariyassa pūre bhūtācariye
anya-e0701n0:37_6: kāle ahesuṃ. Mahābuddhaghosācariyo jambudīpiko. So kira magadharaṭṭhe ghosakagāme
anya-e0701n0:37_7: rañño purohitassa kesi nāma brāhmaṇassa putto, satthusāsane pabbajjitvā laṅkādīpaṃ
anya-e0701n0:38_0: Buddhadattācariyo, ānandācariyo, dhammapālācariyo, dve bubbācariyo, mahāvajira-buddhācariyo,
anya-e0701n0:38_2: culladhammapālācariyo, kassapācariyoti ime ekādasacariyā jambudīpikā heṭṭhā vuttapakāre
anya-e0701n0:38_3: ganthe akaṃsu. Mahānāmācariyo, aññatarācariyā, cullamahānāmācariyo, upasenācariyo,
anya-e0701n0:38_5: dvācariyā, anuruddhācariyo, khemācariyo, sāriputtācariyo, buddhanāgācariyo, cullamoggalānācariyo,
anya-e0701n0:38_6: vācissavācariyo, sumaṅgalācariyo, buddhapiyācariyo, dhammakitti ācariyo medhaṅkarācariyo,
anya-e0701n0:38_7: buddharakkhitācariyo, upatissā cariyo, aññatarā vīsatācariyā, saddhammasirācariyo,
anya-e0701n0:38_8: devācariyo, cullabuddhaghosācariyo, sāriputtācariyo, raṭṭhapālācariyoti ime dve paññāsācariyā
anya-e0701n0:38_9: laṅkādīpikācariyā nāma. Subhūtacandācariyo, aggavaṃsācariyo, navo vajirabuddhācariyo,
anya-e0701n0:38_10: guṇasāgarācariyo, abhayācariyo, ñāṇasāgarācariyo, aññatarā dvācariyā, uttamācariyo,
anya-e0701n0:38_11: aññataro ācariyo, aññataro mahāmacco, dhammasenāpatācariyo, aññatarā tayo ācariyā,
anya-e0701n0:38_12: saddhammaguru ācariyo, sāriputtācariyo, aññataro ekā ācariyo, medhaṅkarācariyo, aggapaṇḍitācariyo,
anya-e0701n0:38_13: cīvarācariyo, saddhammajotipālācariyo, vimalabuddhācariyoti ime tevīsati ācariyā
anya-e0701n0:38_14: jambudīpikā heṭṭhā vuttappakāre ganthe pukkāma saṅkhāte arimaddana nagare akaṃsu.
anya-e0701n0:39_0: Navovimalabuddhācariyo jambudīpiko heṭṭhā vuttappakāre ganthe paṃyanagare akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:39_1: Aññatarācariyo ariyavaṃsācariyoti ime dvācariyā jambudīpikā heṭṭhā vuttappakāre ganthe
anya-e0701n0:39_2: ati [navi] pure akaṃsu, aññatarā vīsatācariyā jambudīpikā heṭṭhā vuttappakāre ganthe
anya-e0701n0:40: [Iti cullaganthavaṃse ācariyānaṃ sañjātaṭṭhāna dīpako nāma tatiyo paricchedo.]
anya-e0701n0:42_0: Ganthā pana siyā āyācanena ācariyehi katā, siyā anāyācanena ācariyehi katā. Katame
anya-e0701n0:42_1: ganthā āyācanena, katame anāyācanena katā? Mahākaccāyana gantho, mahāaṭṭhakathā gantho,
anya-e0701n0:42_2: mahāpaccariya gantho, mahākurundi gantho, mahāpaccariyaganthassa aṭṭhakathā gantho,
anya-e0701n0:42_3: mahākurundi ganthassa aṭṭhakathā ganthoti. Imehi cha ganthehi attano matiyā sāsanuggahanatthāya
anya-e0701n0:44_0: Buddhaghosācariya ganthesu pana visuddhimaggo, saṅghapālena nāma saṅghatherena āyācitena
anya-e0701n0:44_1: buddhaghosācariyena kato. Dīghanikāyassa aṭṭhakathā gantho dāṭhā nāmena saṅghatherena
anya-e0701n0:44_2: āyācitena buddhaghosācariyena kato. Majjhimanikāyassa aṭṭhakathā gantho buddhamittanāmena
anya-e0701n0:44_3: therena āyācitena buddhaghosācariyena kato. Saṃyuttanikāyassa aṭṭhakathā gantho jotipālena
anya-e0701n0:44_4: nāma therena āyācitena buddhaghosācariyena kato. Aṅguttaranikāyassa aṭṭhakathā gantho
anya-e0701n0:44_5: bhaddantā nāma therena sahaājīvakena upāsakena ca āyācitena buddhaghosācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:44_6: Samantapāsādikā nāma aṭṭhakathā gantho buddhasiri nāmena therena āyācitena buddhaghosācariyena
anya-e0701n0:44_7: kato. Sattannaṃ abhidhamma-ganthānaṃ aṭṭhakathā gantho cullabuddhaghosena bhikkhunā
anya-e0701n0:44_8: āyācitena buddhaghosācariyena kato. Dhammapadassaaṭṭhakathā gantho kumārakassapanāmena
anya-e0701n0:44_9: therena āyācitena buddhaghosācariyena kato. Jātakassaaṭṭhakathā gantho atthadassī,
anya-e0701n0:44_10: buddhamitta, buddhapiyadeva saṅkhātehi tīhi therehi āyācitena buddhaghosācariyena
anya-e0701n0:44_11: kato. Khuddakapāṭhassa aṭṭhakathā gantho, suttanipātassa aṭṭhakathā gantho attano
anya-e0701n0:44_12: matiyā buddhaghosācariyena kato. Apadānassa aṭṭhakathā gantho pañcanikāya viññūhi
anya-e0701n0:47_0: Buddhattācariya ganthesu pana vinaya-vinicchayagantho attano sissena buddhasīhena
anya-e0701n0:47_1: nāma therena āyācitena buddhattācariyā kato. Uttara-vinicchayagantho saṅghapālena
anya-e0701n0:47_2: nāmena therena āyācitena buddhadattācariyena kato. Abhidhammāvatāro nāma gantho attano
anya-e0701n0:47_3: sissena sumati therena āyācitena buddhadattācariyena kato. Buddhavaṃsassa aṭṭhakathā
anya-e0701n0:47_4: gantho teneva buddhasīhanāma therena āyācitena buddhadattācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:49: Abhidhammakathāya mūlaṭīkā nāma ṭīkā gantho buddhamittā nāma therena āyācitena ānandācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:51_0: Nettipakaraṇassa aṭṭhakathā gantho dhammarakkhita nāma therena āyācitena dhammapālācariyena
anya-e0701n0:51_1: kato. Itivuttakaaṭṭhakathā gantho, udānaaṭṭhakathā gantho, cariyāpiṭakaaṭṭhakathā
anya-e0701n0:51_2: gantho, therakathāaṭṭhakathā gantho, therikathāaṭṭhakathā gantho, vimānavatthuaṭṭhakathā
anya-e0701n0:51_3: gantho, petavatthuaṭṭhakathā gantho, ime satta ganthā attano matiyā dhammapālācariyena
anya-e0701n0:51_4: kato. Visuddhimaggaṭīkā gantho dāṭhā nāmena nāma therena āyācitena dhammapālācariyena
anya-e0701n0:51_5: kato, dīghanikāya-aṭṭhakathādīnaṃ catunnaṃ aṭṭhakathānaṃ ṭīkā gantho, abhidhammaṭṭhakathāya
anya-e0701n0:51_6: anuṭīkā gantho, nettipakaraṇaṭṭhakathāya ṭīkā gantho, buddhavaṃsaṭṭhakathāya ṭīkā
anya-e0701n0:51_7: gantho, jātakaṭṭhakathāya ṭīkā gantho ceti ime pañca ganthā attano matiyā dhammapālācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:53: Niruttimañjūsā nāma cullaniruttiṭīkā gantho, mahāniruttisaṅkhepo nāma gantho ca attano matiyā pubbācariyehi viṃsu kato.
anya-e0701n0:54_0: Pañca vinayapakaraṇānaṃ vinayagaṇṭhi nāma gantho attano matiyā mahāvajirabuddhācariyena
anya-e0701n0:54_1: kato. Nyāsasaṅkhāto mukhamattadīpanī nāma gantho attano matiyā vimalabuddhi ācariyena
anya-e0701n0:54_2: kato. Atthabyakkhyāno nāma gantho attano matiyā cullavajirabuddhācariyena kato. Rūpasiddhi
anya-e0701n0:54_3: tassa ca ganthassa ṭīkā gantho sabba pañcasuttañca attano matiyā dīpaṅkarācariyena
anya-e0701n0:54_4: kato. Saccasaṅkhepo nāma gantho attano matiyā culladhammapālācariyena kato. Mohacchedanī
anya-e0701n0:54_5: gantho, vimaticchedanī gantho, dasa buddhavaṃso, anāgatavaṃso ca. Attano matiyā kassapācariyena
anya-e0701n0:54_6: kato. Paṭisambhidāmaggassa aṭṭhakathā gantho mahānāmena upāsakena āyācitena mahānāmācariyena
anya-e0701n0:54_7: kato. Dīpavaṃso, thūpavaṃso, bodhivaṃso, cullavaṃso, porāṇavaṃso, mahāvaṃso cāti
anya-e0701n0:54_8: ime cha ganthā attano matiyā mahānāmācariyehi visuṃ katā. Navo mahāvaṃsagantho attano
anya-e0701n0:54_9: matiyā cullamahānāmācariyena kato. Saddhammapajjotikā nāma mahāniddesassa aṭṭhakathā
anya-e0701n0:54_10: gantho devena therena āyācitena upasenācariyena kato. Moggalānabyākaraṇaganthe attano
anya-e0701n0:54_11: matiyā moggalānācariyena kato. Subodhālaṅkāra nāma gantho attano matiyā saṅgharakkhitācariyena
anya-e0701n0:54_12: kato. Vuttodaya gantho attano matiyā vuttodayakārācariyena kato. Khuddasikkhā nāma
anya-e0701n0:54_13: gantho attano matiyā dhammasirācariyena kato. Porāṇakhuddasikkhā ṭīkā ca mūlasikkhā
anya-e0701n0:54_14: cāti, ime dve ganthe attano matiyā aññatarehi dvihācariyehi viṃsu katā.
anya-e0701n0:55_0: Paramatthavinicchayaṃ nāma gantho saṅgharakkhitena therena āyācitena anuruddhācariyena
anya-e0701n0:55_1: kato. Nāmarūpa-paricchedo nāma gantho attano matiyā anuruddhācariyena kato. Abhidhammatthasaṅgahaṃ
anya-e0701n0:55_2: nāma gantho namma nāmena upāsakena āyācitena anuruddhācariyena kato. Khemo nāma gantho
anya-e0701n0:55_3: attano matiyā khemācariyena kato. Sāratthadīpanī nāma vinayaṭṭhakathāya ṭīkā gantho,
anya-e0701n0:55_4: vinayasaṅgahaṃ, vinayasaṅgahassa ṭīkā gantho, aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāya navo ṭīkā ganthoti
anya-e0701n0:55_5: ime cattāro ganthā parakkamabāhu nāmena laṅkādīpissarena raññā āyācitena sāriputtācariyena
anya-e0701n0:55_6: kato. Sakaṭasaddasatthassa pañcikāya ṭīkā gantho attano matiyā sāriputtācariyena
anya-e0701n0:55_7: kato. Kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyā vinayatthamañjūsā nāma ṭīkā gantho sumedhā nāmatherena āyācitena
anya-e0701n0:55_8: buddhanāgācariyena kato. Abhidhānappadīpiko nāma gantho attano matiyā cūlamoggalānācariyena
anya-e0701n0:55_9: kato. Subodhālaṅkārassa mahāsāmi nāma ṭīkā, vuttodaya vivaraṇañcāti ime dve ganthā
anya-e0701n0:55_10: attano matiyā vācissarena katā. Khuddasikkhāya sumaṅgalappasādani nāma navo ṭīkā
anya-e0701n0:55_11: gantho sumaṅgalena āyācitena navācissarena kato. Sambandhacintāṭīkā bālāvatāro, moggalānabyākaraṇassa
anya-e0701n0:55_12: ṭīkā cāti ime tayo ganthā, sumaṅgala, buddhamitta, mahākassapa saṅkhātehi tīhi therehi
anya-e0701n0:55_13: ca, dhammakitti nāma upāsakena, vānijjā bhātu upāsakena ca āyācitena vācissarena
anya-e0701n0:55_14: kato. Nāmarūpaparicchedassa vibhāgo, saddatthassa padarūpa-vibhāvanaṃ, khemapakaraṇassa
anya-e0701n0:55_15: ṭīkā, sīmālaṅkāro, mūlasikkhāya ṭīkā, rūpavibhāgo, paccayasaṅgaho cāti ime satta
anya-e0701n0:55_16: ganthā attano matiyā vācissarena katā. Saccasaṅkhepassa ṭīkā gantho sāriputta-nāmena
anya-e0701n0:55_17: therena āyācitena vācissarena kato. Abhidhammāvatārassa ṭīkā, abhidhammatthasaṅgahassa
anya-e0701n0:55_18: ṭīkā cāti ime dve ganthā attano matiyā sumaṅgalācariyena katā. Sāratthasaṅgahaṃ nāma
anya-e0701n0:55_19: gantho attano matiyā buddhappiyena kato dantadhātuvaṇṇanā nāma pakaraṇaṃ
anya-e0701n0:56_0: Laṅkādīpissarassa rañño senāpatinā āyācitena dhammakittināmācariyena kataṃ. Jinacaritaṃ
anya-e0701n0:56_1: nāma pakaraṇaṃ attano matiyā medhaṅkarācariyena kataṃ. Jinālaṅkāro, jinālaṅkārassa
anya-e0701n0:56_2: ṭīkā attano matiyā buddharakkhitācariyena kato. Amatadharassa nāma anāgatavaṃsassa
anya-e0701n0:56_3: attano matiyā aṭṭhakathā upatissācariyena katā. Kaṅkhāvitaraṇīyā līnatthapakāsinī,
anya-e0701n0:56_4: nisandeho, dhammānusāraṇī, ñeyyā-santati, ñeyyā-santatiyā ṭīkā, sumatāvatāro, lokapaññatti
anya-e0701n0:56_5: pakaraṇaṃ, tathāgatuppatti pakaraṇaṃ, nalāṭadhātuvaṇṇanā, sīhaḷavatthu, dhammadīpako
anya-e0701n0:56_6: paṭipatti saṅgaho, visuddhimaggassa gaṇṭhi, abhidhammagaṇṭhi, nettipakaraṇagaṇṭhi,
anya-e0701n0:56_8: nava ṭīkā ceti, ime vīsati ganthā attano matiyā vīsatācariyehi viṃsu viṃsu katā.
anya-e0701n0:57_0: Saddattha bhedacintā nāma pakaraṇaṃ attano matiyā saddhammasirināmācariyena kataṃ.
anya-e0701n0:57_1: Sumana-kūṭavaṇṇanaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ, rāhulā nāma therena āyācitena vācissarenadevatherena
anya-e0701n0:57_2: kataṃ. Sotattha kiṃ mahānidānaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ attano matiyā cullabuddhaghosācariyena
anya-e0701n0:57_3: kataṃ. Madhurasaṅgāhani nāma pakaraṇaṃ attano matiyā raṭṭhapālācariyena kataṃ. Liṅgatthavivaraṇaṃ
anya-e0701n0:57_4: nāma pakaraṇaṃ attano matiyā subhūtacandācariyena kataṃ. Saddanītipakaraṇaṃ attano
anya-e0701n0:57_5: matiyā aggavaṃsācariyena kataṃ. Nyāsapakaraṇassa mahāṭīkā nāma ṭīkā attano matiyā
anya-e0701n0:57_6: vajirabuddhācariyena katā. Mukhamattasāro attano matiyā guṇasāgarācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:57_7: Mukhamattasārassa ṭīkā sutasampanna nāmena dhammarājino gurunā saṅghatherena āyācitena
anya-e0701n0:57_8: guṇasāgarācariyena katā. Saddatthabhedacintāya mahāṭīkā attano matiyā abhayācariyena
anya-e0701n0:57_9: katā. Liṅgatthavivaraṇappakāsakaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ attano matiyā ñāṇasāgarācariyena
anya-e0701n0:57_10: kataṃ. Guḷhatthassa ṭīkā bālappabodhanañca duvidhaṃ pakaraṇaṃ attano matiyā aññatarācariyena
anya-e0701n0:57_11: kataṃ. Saddatthabhedacintāya majjhimaṭīkā attano matiyā aññatarācariyena katā. Bālāvatārassa
anya-e0701n0:57_12: ṭīkā, liṅgatthavivaraṇā ṭīkā ca attano matiyā uttamācariyena katā. Saddatthabhedacintāya
anya-e0701n0:57_13: nava ṭīkā attano matiyā aññatarācariyena katā. Abhidhānappadīpikāya ṭīkā daṇḍīpakaraṇassa
anya-e0701n0:57_14: magagha-bhūtā ṭīkā cāti duvidhā ṭīkāyo attano mati, sīhasūra nāma rañño ekena amaccena
anya-e0701n0:57_15: katā. Koladdhajanassaṭīkā pāsādikena nāma therena āyācitena teneva mahāmaccena katā.
anya-e0701n0:57_16: Kārikaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ ñāṇagambhīranāmena bhikkhunā āyācitena dhammasenāpatācariyena
anya-e0701n0:57_17: kataṃ. Etimāsamidīpanī [vā etimāsamidīpikā] nāma pakaraṇaṃ manohārañca attano matiyā
anya-e0701n0:57_18: teneva dhammasenāpatācariyena kataṃ. Kārikāya ṭīkā attano matiyā aññatarācariyena
anya-e0701n0:57_19: katā. Etimāsamidīpikāya ṭīkā attano matiyā aññatarācariyena katā.
anya-e0701n0:58_0: Saddabindupakaraṇaṃ attano matiyā dhammarājassa gurunā aññatarācariyena kataṃ. Saddavuttippakāsakaṃ
anya-e0701n0:58_1: nāma pakaraṇaṃ aññatarena bhikkhunā āyācitena saddhammaguru nāmācariyena kataṃ. Saddavuttippakāsakassa
anya-e0701n0:59_0: Kaccāyana sāro ca kaccāyanasārassa ṭīkā cāti duvidhaṃ pakaraṇaṃ attano matiyā aññatarācariyena
anya-e0701n0:59_1: kataṃ. Lokadīpakasāraṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ attano matiyā navenamedhaṅkarācariyena kataṃ.
anya-e0701n0:59_2: Lokuppattipakaraṇaṃ attano matiyā aggapaṇḍitācariyena kataṃ. Jaṅghadāsakassa ṭīkā
anya-e0701n0:59_3: bhūtā magadhaṭīkā attano matiyā cīvarācariyena katā. Mātikatthadīpanī, abhidhammatthasaṅgahavaṇṇanā,
anya-e0701n0:59_4: sīmālaṅkārassaṭīkā, gaṇṭhisāro, paṭṭhānagaṇanānayo cāti ime pañca pakaraṇāni attano
anya-e0701n0:59_5: matiyā saddhammajotipālācariyena katāni. Saṅkhepavaṇṇanā parakkamabāhu-nāmena jambudīpissarena
anya-e0701n0:59_6: rañño āyācite teneva saddhammajotipālācariyena katā. Kaccāyanassa suttaniddeso attano
anya-e0701n0:59_7: sissena dhammacārinā therena āyācitena saddhammajotipālācariyena kato. Vinayasamuṭṭhānadīpanī
anya-e0701n0:59_8: nāma pakaraṇaṃ, attano gurunā saṅghatherena āyācitena saddhamma-jotipālācariyena kataṃ.
anya-e0701n0:60_0: Sattapakaraṇāni pana tena pukkāmanagare katāni. Saṅkhepavaṇṇanāva laṅkādīpe katā.
anya-e0701n0:60_1: Abhidhamma-pannarasaṭṭhānavaṇṇānaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ attano matiyā navena-vimalabuddhācariyena
anya-e0701n0:60_2: katā. Saddasāratthajālinī nāma pakaraṇaṃ attano matiyā navena-vimalabuddhācariyena
anya-e0701n0:60_3: kataṃ. Saddasārattha-jāliniyā ṭīkā, paṃyanagare rañño gurunā saṅgharājena āyācitena
anya-e0701n0:60_4: teneva navena vimalabuddhācariyena katā. Vuttodayassa ṭīkā, abhidhammasaṅgahassa
anya-e0701n0:60_5: ṭīkāya paramatthamañjūsā nāma anuṭīkā, dasagaṇṭhivaṇṇanaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ, magadhabhūtavidaggamukhamaṇḍaniyāṭīkā
anya-e0701n0:60_6: cāti imāni cattāri pakaraṇāni attano matiyā teneva navena vimalabuddhācariyena katāni.
anya-e0701n0:61_0: Pañcapakaraṇaṭīkāya navānuṭīkā attano matiyā aññataro cariyena katā. Abhidhammasaṅgahassa
anya-e0701n0:61_1: navaṭīkā attano matiyā aññatarācariyena katā. Abhidhammatthasaṅgahaṭīkāya [maṇi]
anya-e0701n0:61_2: mañjūsā [maṇisāramañjūsā] nāma navānuṭīkā attano matiyā ariyavaṃsācariyena katā.
anya-e0701n0:62_0: Peṭakopadesassa ṭīkā attano matiyā udumbarināmācariyena pukkāmanagare katā. Catubhāṇavārassa
anya-e0701n0:62_1: aṭṭhakathā, mahāsārapakāsini, mahādīpanī, sāratthadīpanī, gatipakaraṇaṃ, hatthāsāro,
anya-e0701n0:62_4: dantadhātu-pakaraṇassa ṭīkā ca saddhammopāyano bālappabodhanaṭīkā ca, jinālaṅkārassa
anya-e0701n0:62_5: navaṭīkā ca, liṅgattha-vivaraṇaṃ, liṅgattha-vinicchayo, pātimokkhavivaraṇaṃ, paramatthakathāvivaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0701n0:62_9: sakkābhimataṃ, mahāvessantarajātakassa navaṭṭhakathā, paṭhama-sambodhi ca lokanetti,
anya-e0701n0:62_11: saddavuttippakaraṇassa navaṭīkā cāti imāni, ticattālīsa pakaraṇāni attano matiyā
anya-e0701n0:62_12: sāsanassa jātiyā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā ca laṅkādīpādīsu viṃsu viṃsu katāni.
anya-e0701n0:63_0: Sambuddhe gāthā ca…pe… navahāraguṇavaṇṇanā cāti ime buddhapaṇāmādikā gāthāyo. Attano
anya-e0701n0:63_1: attano buddhaguṇapakāsanatthāya attano ca pare ca anantapaññāpavattanatthāya ca paṇḍitehi
anya-e0701n0:66_0: Nāmaṃ āropanaṃ potthakaṃ ganthakārassa ca. Lekhaṃlekhāpanañceva, vadāmi tadanantaranti.
anya-e0701n0:66_1: Tattha caturāsītiyā dhammakkhandhasahassāni piṭaka, nikāyaṅga, vagga, nipātādikaṃ
anya-e0701n0:66_2: nāmaṃ, kenāropitaṃ, kattha āropitaṃ, kadā āropitaṃ, kimatthaṃ āropitanti? Tatrāyaṃ
anya-e0701n0:66_3: pivisajjanākena āropitanti pañcasatakhīṇāsavehi āropitaṃ. Tehi sabbabuddhavacanaṃ
anya-e0701n0:66_4: saṅgāyanti, idaṃ piṭakaṃ, ayaṃ nikāyo, idaṃ aṅgaṃ, ayaṃ vaggo, ayaṃ nipātoti. Evamādikaṃ
anya-e0701n0:66_5: nāmaṃ āropenti. Kattha āropitanti? Rājagahe vebhārapabbatassa pāde dhammamaṇḍappe
anya-e0701n0:66_6: āropitaṃ. Kadā āropitanti? Bhagavato parinibbute paṭhamasaṅgāyanakāle āropitaṃ. Kimatthaṃ
anya-e0701n0:66_7: āropitanti? Dhammakkhandhānaṃ vohārasukhatthāya sukhadhāraṇatthāya ca āropitaṃ. Saṅgītikāle
anya-e0701n0:66_8: pañcasatā khīṇāsavā tesañca dhammakkhandhānaṃ nāma vagganipātato. Imassa dhammakkhandhassa
anya-e0701n0:66_9: ayaṃ nāmo hotu, imassa ca pakaraṇassa ayaṃ nāmoti, abravuṃ sabbaṃ nāmādikaṃ kiccaṃ
anya-e0701n0:66_10: akaṃsu. Te khīṇāsavā, yadi nāmādikaṃ kiccaṃ akataṃ na supākataṃ tasmā vohārasukhatthāyanāmādikaṃ
anya-e0701n0:66_11: kiccaṃ kataṃ anāgate panatthāya nāmādikaṃ pavattitaṃ asañjātanāmo na suṭṭhu pākato
anya-e0701n0:66_12: sabbaso bhaveti. Dhammakkhandhānaṃ nāma dīpanā niṭṭhitā.
anya-e0701n0:67_0: Caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassāni kena potthake āropitāni, kadā āropitāni, kimatthaṃ
anya-e0701n0:67_1: āropitānīti. Tatrāyaṃ visajjanā kenāropitāniti? Khīṇāsavamahānāgehi āropitāni. Kattha
anya-e0701n0:67_2: āropitānīti? Laṅkādīpe āropitāni. Kadā āropitānīti? Saddhātissassarājino puttassa
anya-e0701n0:67_3: vaṭṭagāmani rājassa kāle āropitāni. Kimatthaṃ āropitānīti? Dhammakkhandhānaṃ avidhaṃsanatthāya
anya-e0701n0:70: Sabbepi te bhikkhu ādi, manasā vacasāhāro;
anya-e0701n0:73: Ariyānariyā cāpi ca, sabbe vācuggatā dhuvaṃ.
anya-e0701n0:75: Sabbe puthujjanā ceva, ariyā ca sabbepite.
anya-e0701n0:79: Tato paramhi rājā ca, tato cuto ca tusite.
anya-e0701n0:80: Uppajji deva loke so, devehi parivārito;
anya-e0701n0:81: Saddhā tissoti nāmena, tassa kaniṭṭhako hito.
anya-e0701n0:83: Tadā kāle bhikkhū āsuṃ, sabbe vācuggatā sadā;
anya-e0701n0:84: Nikāye pañcavedheva, yāva rañño ca dhāraṇā;
anya-e0701n0:85: Tato cuto so rājā ca, tussīte upapajjati;
anya-e0701n0:87: Tassa puttāpi ahesuṃ, anekā varajjaṃ gatā;
anya-e0701n0:91: Tato paraṃ potthakesu, nikāyā pañca piṭṭhitā;
anya-e0701n0:92: Tadā aṭṭhakathā ṭīkā, sabbe ganthā potthake gatā;
anya-e0701n0:93: Sabbe potthesu ye ganthā, pāḷi aṭṭhakathā ṭīkā;
anya-e0701n0:94: Saṃṭṭhitāsaṃ ṭhitā honti, sabbepi no na santite.
anya-e0701n0:95: Tadā te potthakeyeva, nikāyā piṭhitā khilā;
anya-e0701n0:102: Sabbepi te bhikkhū āsuṃ, bahuṃtarā puthujjanā;
anya-e0701n0:103: Na sakkhissanti te pañca, nikāye vācuggataṃ iti;
anya-e0701n0:106: Tato paṭṭhāyate sabbe, nikāyā honti potthake;
anya-e0701n0:107: Aṭṭhakathā ṭīkā sabbe, te honti potthakeṭṭhitā.
anya-e0701n0:108: Tato paṭṭhāyate sabbe, bhikkhu ādi mahāgaṇā;
anya-e0701n0:111_0: Yo koci paṇḍito dhīro, aṭṭhakathādikaṃ ganthaṃ karoti vā kārāpeti vā, tassa anantako
anya-e0701n0:111_1: hoti puññasaṃcayo, anantako hoti puññānisaṃso. Caturāsīti cetiyasahassa karaṇasadiso,
anya-e0701n0:111_3: caturāsīti vihārasahassa karaṇasadiso, yo ca buddhavacanamañjūsaṃ karoti vā kārāpeti
anya-e0701n0:111_4: vā, yo ca buddhavacanaṃ maṇḍanaṃ karoti vā kārāpeti vā, yo ca buddhavacanaṃ lekhaṃ
anya-e0701n0:111_5: karoti vā kārāpeti vā, yo ca potthakaṃ vā, yo ca potthakamūlaṃ vā, deti vā dāpeti
anya-e0701n0:111_6: vā, yo ca telaṃ vā cuṇṇaṃ vā, dhaññaṃ vā potthakabhañjanatthāya yaṃ kiñci nitthaṃ
anya-e0701n0:111_7: vā potthakachidde āvunatthāya, yaṃ kiñci suttaṃ vā kaṭṭhaphalakadvayaṃ vā potthakaṃ
anya-e0701n0:111_8: puṭanatthāya yaṃ kiñci vatthaṃ vā, potthaka-bandhanatthāya, yaṃ kiñci yottaṃ vā potthakalāpa
anya-e0701n0:111_9: pūṭanatthāya yaṃ kiñci thavikaṃ deti vā dāpeti vā.
anya-e0701n0:112_0: Yo ca haritālena vā manosilāya vā, suvaṇṇena vā rajatena vā potthakamaṇḍanaṃ vā kaṭṭhaphalakamaṇḍanaṃ
anya-e0701n0:112_1: vā karoti vā kārāpeti vā, tassa anantako hoti puññasaṃcayo, anantako hoti puññānisaṃso.
anya-e0701n0:112_2: Caturāsīti cetiyasahassa karaṇasadiso, caturāsīti vihārasahassa karaṇasadiso.
anya-e0701n0:114: Mahā tejo sadā hoti, sīhanādo visārado.
anya-e0701n0:121: Sabbe sattāpi yo loke, sabbattha pūjitābhave;
anya-e0701n0:127: Tasmāhi paṇḍito poso, saṃpassaṃ hita mattano;
anya-e0701n0:128: Kāreyya sāma ganthe ca, aññe cāpi kārāpaye.
anya-e0701n0:129: Potthake ca ṭhite ganthe, pāḷi aṭṭhakathādike;
anya-e0701n0:130: Dhammamañjūsā ganthe ca, lekhaṃ kare kārāpaye.
anya-e0701n0:133: Dhammabandhanatthāya ca, yaṃ kiñci mahagghaṃ vatthaṃ;
anya-e0701n0:141: Sohaṃ tato gantvā cimaṃ, jina navaṃ yaṃ pūraṃ;
anya-e0701n0:143: Sabba dhammaṃ vissejjento, kikāre neva bhikkhuno;
anya-e0701n0:144: Cha vassānaṃ gaṇaṃ bhitvā, kāmānaṃ abhimaddanaṃ.
anya-e0701n0:145: Santi sabhā ca nibbānaṃ, gavesiñca punappunaṃ;
anya-e0701n0:148: Iti pāmojjatthāya araññavāsinā, nandapaññācariyena kato cūḷaganthavaṃso niṭṭhito.
anya-e0701n0:149: Dhammavaṭaṃsakanāmena visuto thero, yaṃ pakaraṇaṃ likkhitaṃ taṃ paripuṇṇaṃ tena puññena taṃ piṭakaṃ parisippaṃ pariniṭṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0701n0:150: Mameva sissasamūhānañca parisippaṃ pariniṭṭhitaṃ. Tave sissānū sissāni ca, parisippaṃ pariniṭṭhitaṃ.
